title: Desert Temple of the Obsidian Lord
story: The temple of the Obsidian Lord is situated deep in the desert of yellow sand, protected by the harsh weather. Now it is controlled by a gang of bandits. Rumors say that a legendary tome Sorinna is hidden here.

notes.text: The small room is filled with swirly smoke. It teleports a person outside the temple when inhaled.
A lavishly decorated door to the west.
Rations, a blood-stained spear and some gold tucked under some debris.
A stuffed elf warlock with a lantern of power in their hands.
